document.full_text: the scramble by global food companies into india's fast food sector intensified on monday as several u.s. chains announced plans to enter the country, hoping to tap the surging spending power in asia's third-largest economy.
document.title: u.s. fast-food chains bet on india to drive growth
lines_and_colors: the scramble by global food companies into india's fast food sector intensified on monday as several u.s. chains announced plans to enter the country, hoping to tap the surging spending power in asia's third-largest economy.
